bio: I'm a Social Entrepreneur & Founder Director of Egroceryshop.in a worldwide Online Supermarket that enables farmers to sell online directly to customers  removing middlemen & controlling rise in prices of all essential commodities like Rice,Wheat,groceries,Consumer packaged good ,clothings,lifestyle gadgets at  fair price to consumers  worldwide St Paul's High School,Vepery,Chennai Vignesh IT Solutionz,Chennai I'm a Social Entrepreneur & Founder Director of Egroceryshop.in a worldwide Online Supermarket Maritime (India)Services,ShirdiSaibabaShipping Agency,Bhavana Garments,K.Mohan&Co,Mehta Chemical Agency,
